Creative Services Leader, Medical Products Division

W. L. Gore & Associates is a uniquely creative, technology-driven enterprise focused on discovery and product innovation. Gore has served a variety of global markets for more than 50 years, providing our customers with high-value products that enhance the quality of life. Gore is known worldwide for our innovative culture as well as our fundamental understanding of expanded fluoropolymers, which the company pioneered with Bob Gore’s discovery of expanded polytetrafluoroethylene. We believe Gore’s success is a direct result of the strong values embedded in our company’s culture. This culture is built on a deeply held belief in associates and in the innate drive of each person to reach his or her full potential. We are committed to fostering a safe and healthy workplace where all associates can develop their talents, enjoy their work, and responsibly direct their own activities. As Gore associates, we take great pride in being part of a strong global enterprise and in the broad contributions we make to society. We are committed to meeting the needs of our customers through our innovative, reliable products and to improving the communities in which we work and live. We are committed to achieving a positive economic impact while being environmentally responsible and to taking a holistic approach that considers the short- and long-term implications of our decisions and the prosperity of future generations.

I had the pleasure of working directly with Debi for a number of years with LAVIDGE. She has a way of inspiring creatives in a way that allows them to do their best work. Debi is supportive of the process that we all go through and is encouraging in her recommendations which only makes us want to be better at what we do.She gives guidance when needed and able to allow you to see a different point of view if there is need for additional direction. I'm lucky to have had the opportunity to work for her.

June 29, 2015, Brandon worked with Debra in different groups

I've had the absolute genuine honor of working with Debi at LAVIDGE. In a town given little credit for top creative talent Debi is playing on an entirely different level. While many Creative Directors rely on others to develop the business strategy to serve as their creative springboard, Debi possesses the very rare ability to drive the strategic insights, then back it up with clever, efficient and dazzling creative concepts. There are simply not enough superlatives to describe how devastatingly talented Debi is. The best advice I can give anyone who makes the very wise decision to have Debi handle their creative work is to make a second smart decision...get out of her damn way and enjoy the kick @$$ results!

I’ve worked with Debi as a colleague, and have been a client of hers as well.  I can candidly say that Debi is one of the most talented Creative Directors I’ve encountered.  She pours herself into projects, researching background and uncovering details and gaining a perspective that is then transformed into solutions that connect with the audience.  In my experience that it’s rare to find the combination of strategic acuity and design talent that Debi brings and I would highly recommend her for any career opportunity she pursues.

creative director, art director & graphic designer

I cannot praise Melissa enough. She is one of the most talented art directors I've ever worked with in my long career. Melissa always pushes people and clients to be better and looks for unique solutions to marketing problems – whether it be a social experience, ambient executions, more strategic media and digital applications – she'll pitch for it. She has exquisite taste and keeps up-to-date with design and marketing trends. I was always amazed at her ability to make quick design and editing decisions; her on-set demeanor and mad set-styling skills; her swift problem-solving and acumen, and sheer creative genious. Melissa is a true asset to whomever she works with and for.
